tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SecurityIncidentForensics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    incident_date DATE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    affected_systems JSON,
    analyst_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (analyst_id) REFERENCES Analyst(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Evidence (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    evidence_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    evidence_details JSON
);

CREATE TABLE forensic_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  investigator_id INT,
  analysis_results TEXT,
  analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES forensic_cases(case_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (investigator_id) REFERENCES investigators(investigator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE forensic_evidence ( 
    evidence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    incident_id UUID, 
    evidence_type TEXT, 
    collected_by TEXT, 
    collected_timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results ( 
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    incident_id UUID, 
    findings TEXT, 
    analyst TEXT, 
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE evidence_collection (
    evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
    evidence_description TEXT,
    incident_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    investigator_id INT,
    incident_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (investigator_id) REFERENCES forensic_investigators(investigator_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityIncident ( 
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  incident_date DATE, 
  description TEXT, 
  severity INT
 )

CREATE TABLE ForensicInvestigator ( 
  investigator_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  name VARCHAR(50), 
  specialization VARCHAR(50), 
  location VARCHAR(50)
 )

CREATE TABLE EvidenceCollection ( 
  evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  collected_date DATE, 
  collected_by INT, 
  description TEXT
 )

CREATE TABLE IncidentLocation ( 
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  city VARCHAR(50), 
  country VARCHAR(50), 
 incident_id INT
 )

CREATE TABLE DataQuery ( 
  query_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  query_date DATE, 
 query TEXT
 )
